description: Highly renowned in his native Verona, Michelin - starred chef Giancarlo Perbellini has now opened a restaurant in Milan, where he continues to offer traditional Italian cuisine from the north and south of the country, with a nod to new techniques and contemporary trends. Situated in the central Brera district, his warm and welcoming restaurant is small, discreet and, of course, highly elegant.
